attributes.action: award a pay rise in line with inflation to all teaching assistants and nursery nurses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has set our current payrise at around 2.5%.  Inflation is nearly 5%.  This is not a pay rise but a pay cut.  Teaching assistants perform an invaluable and little recognised roll in schools and deserve appropriate recompense and recognition.
